definition: daughter's son/grandson/descendant via the female line

sentences.english: Yang Yun, her son, in his childhood, liked reading his grandfather's unopened manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 其外孫楊惲從小愛讀外公這部尚未公開的書稿。

sentences.english: The couple has one daughter and one granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 這對夫婦有一個女兒和一個外孫女。

sentences.english: The granddaughter of the Goddess of Heaven visited the earth.
sentences.chinese: 王母娘娘的外孫女下凡到人間。

sentences.english: I really want to get to know my grandson and my son-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很想認識下我的外孫和女婿。

sentences.english: Rajani was Mr. M's granddaughter, the child of his oldest married daughter.
sentences.chinese: 拉賈尼是M先生長女的女兒，他的外孫女。

sentences.english: And hast not suffered me to kiss my sons and my daughters?
sentences.chinese: 又不容我與外孫和女兒親嘴。

sentences.english: Remember, too, that I’m my wife’s grandson.
sentences.chinese: 還要記住，我還是我妻子的外孫子。

sentences.english: Their daughter is busy with her job, and their grandson is cared for by their son-in-law’s parents.
sentences.chinese: 老兩口的女兒工作很忙，外孫由親家帶着。

sentences.english: A grandnephew is almost the same as a grandson; in default of a lawyer one takes a lancer.
sentences.chinese: 侄孫和外孫，區別不大，丟了個律師，來個長矛兵。

sentences.english: When is Helen going to visit her granddaughter in China?
sentences.chinese: 海倫什麼時候來中國看她的外孫女？

sentences.english: It was like having 33, 000 precocious grandchildren!
sentences.chinese: 我就像有33，000個珍貴的外孫一樣。

sentences.english: The old man died, leaving his grandson a big fortune.
sentences.chinese: 老人去世的時候，留給外孫一大筆財產。

sentences.english: There's a girl nearby who is just 31 years old and already has a granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 附近有個女孩只有31歲但已經有一個外孫女了。

sentences.english: Her parents, worried that they would also be cut off from their grandson, agreed to perform community service.
sentences.chinese: 她父母擔心見不到外孫，就同意完成社區服務。

sentences.english: An ancient grandmother lived with her daughter and grandson.
sentences.chinese: 一位老祖母與她的女兒和外孫生活在一起。

sentences.english: Old Mr. and Mrs. Smith have a daughter and three granddaughters.
sentences.chinese: 老史密斯夫婦有一個女兒和三個外孫女。

definition: to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
my (you etc) old father/polite appellation for an elderly male
to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal)/to cook
term of respect for your teacher's wife
